```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidytext)
library(superml)
```


```{r}
mh <- read_csv('mental_health.csv')
```

```{r}
tidymessage <- mh %>% unnest_tokens(word, text)
```


```{r}
tidymessage <- tidymessage %>% 
    mutate(label = as.factor(label))
```

```{r}
mh %>%  unnest_tokens(word, text) %>%  count(word, sort=TRUE)
```

```{r}
cfv <- CountVectorizer$new(max_features = 10, remove_stopwords = TRUE)

# generate the matrix
cf_mat <- cfv$fit_transform(mh$text)

head(cf_mat, 3)
```
